name: Car Go Vroom
description:
Racing games have been made over and over, all following the same set of rules and game mechanics. At lest, all until now.  Car Go Vroom is no ordinary car game! Be prepared for the unlikely as you transform into a chicken, receive a lecture about socks, get surrounded by 100 cars, and more! Featuring 10+ events and a nearly infinite terrain, Car Go Vroom is sure to engage you and inspire you as insane and unfathomable events unfold. Press left and right to move. Press R to restart the stage.

Don't land upside down!

EVENTS

1. Long Lecture

Get a lecture about stinky socks!

2. The Microwave

Get heated up in a microwave!

3.  The Potato Peeler

Get transformed into a chicken!

4. Rush Hour

Get surrounded by TONS OF CARS!!!

5.  The Rapture

Get blasted into outer space!

6.  Health Refill

Have a busted car? This may be the fix!

7. Soccer Practice

Get bombarded by soccer balls!

8. Police Chase

Flee the police! Don't get caught!

9. Hijacked Car

Don't move, or else...

10. Earthquake

The ground is shaking! Touching it may prove fatal!

11. Upbeat

The music takes on a new octave....and key...and speed....

Enjoy the game! Don't forget to leave a review!
